amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in the Congressional Record to revise funding levels by reducing the amount made available for "Atomic Energy Defense Activities--National Nuclear Security Administration--Weapons Activities", and increasing the amount made available by "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Construction", by $100 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 253 (Roll no. 341).
